summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: both SiteHeader and SiteFooter no longer show a logo image and still render the site name text and navigation/links. However, the diff summary also includes unrelated changes/descriptions (hero asset URL handling, service tier/pricing changes, color/theme updates) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Hero section changed to use a base-path-aware assetUrl helper for the hero background image.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove header and footer logo images; no request to alter hero asset loading or introduce/expand assetUrl usage elsewhere.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HeroSection summary: "now uses the base-path-aware assetUrl helper")

hallucinated_features.description: Service tiers content/pricing/turnaround/features updated across multiple tiers.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any pricing, tier, or feature changes—only removal of header/footer logos.

hallucinated_features.description: Contact form styling updated to use a new red primary color for buttons and success states.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to removing logo images cleanly and did not request theme/color changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ContactFormSection summary: "updated to use the new red primary color")

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/style updates (OKLCH color system palette changes; .logo-square utility changed) and Tailwind config updates (colors/typography/etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals include not redesigning overall site theme/typography beyond what’s necessary to remove logo images; also .logo-square changes are not necessary if logos are removed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css summary: "Global styles with OKLCH color system...")
frontend-file-summaries.txt (tailwind.config.js summary: "Tailwind configuration with custom color tokens, typography...")
frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css summary mentions .logo-square changes affecting header/footer logos)

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/description of a new helper module for base-path-aware static assets (assetUrl helper).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; scope limited to removing logo images from header/footer.
